website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate USB headphones for gamers who want a clear, crisp sound and no background noise interference.
pros: Sturdy, heavy-duty cable that won't break
Excellent sound quality across the full sound spectrum
cons: The headset is large and heavy, and some may find this to be uncomfortable

website_summaries.verdict: The Sades USB Gaming Headset is large, comfortable and has quality sound for a highly affordable price.
pros: The Sades headset has some weight to it and feels like it's made from quality materials
The microphone conveniently slides inside the ear piece so it's out of your way when you're not using it
We loved the length and thickness of the USB cord, it felt like it was built to last
We also found the sound quality to be on par with many of its other, more expensive competitors
The headset itself is rather large, but this only added to the overall comfort
cons: Ear pieces don't swivel, so getting the perfect position takes some maneuvering

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly USB headphones with Mic. NOT LONG LASTING
customer_reviews.text: These Sades headphones are awesome! Very comfortable, even after extended periods. Sound is great, and the digital surround sound is really quite immersive. Keep in mind its not true surround sound, but it's still great quality and way better than earbuds. The headphones are really lightweight despite looking quite larger and bulky. However, the headphones are physically bulky in design. This doesn't bother me though... The micropone which folds out from the left earcup is a little on the under-sensitive side. Meaning you may have to adjust your Mic sensitivity on your PC or concole to fine tune the loudness of your voice. Other than that, these are an awesome budget friendly pair of headphones for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Dear. God.
customer_reviews.text: Dear. God. If you are to get usb headphones, look no further. These are absolutely perfect in every way. Audio quality is extreme, much better than a $300 pair of beats
customer_reviews.author: Custom Computer Builders

customer_reviews.title: Grrrr...
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that I love the construction of this headset. The feel is premium all the way around and the input/output audio is formidable. Unfortunately, after 30 minutes of blissful use on Discord while I was playing games on my Win10 MSI GT72, the headset just died. I removed the USB and plugged it in again, Win10 states, "USB Device is Not Recognized". All troubleshooting measures failed and Sades did not have a specific driver for this model. These headphones seriously died in transmission! I am really disappointed, these are nicely engineered headphones with a fatal flaw on Win10, I suppose..
customer_reviews.author: Nize

customer_reviews.title: Stitching on Pad Coming Undone After Two Uses
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of the price and color scheme. The sound is good and they are comfortable to wear, but after about two uses the stitching on the earpiece is coming undone revealing the foam pad beneath. It looks like it will get worse with more use, and I'm not hard on my stuff. This is a cool-looking set, but I wouldn't buy this again. Otherwise, I like the microphone that folds up and the cable is braided and feels sturdy. It's really too bad, I wanted to like this headset.
customer_reviews.author: MGrafton

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones at a deal of a price.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphones that compete with higher tier headphones, I bought a pair of these a few years ago and just got another pair for a second computer, They have great sound, pretty decent base, The noise cancellation is effective but not 100% The comfort is extremely nice (used these for 6 hours a day for a month one time with no discomfort or soreness) The lights on the side are pleasing and cool to look at. And the mic quality is very decent, have no issues from my friends and they claim to hear me very well without background noise or static.
customer_reviews.author: Dontclickme

customer_reviews.title: Connects ONLY by USB
customer_reviews.text: One of the pictures for this product says that the USB plug-in is only for the light-up effect. So I was expecting to get headphones that had a separate audio and mic plug-in, but the only connector is a USB, which doesn't fit my needs. So I'm going to have to buy new headphones. I'm going to stay away from this company because their advertisement doesn't match up with the product. Overall the headphones seem fine. They are very tight around the head, so it takes some getting used to. They just don't work well with the way my computer operates. I need headphones that attach the audio and the mic separately.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Divers are crap
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 drivers for headphones will not setup. The setup cannot find headphone even thought Windows state that it recognizes the headphones. Gave up, will buy different headset and give these to a family member who will use the just for the sound and not the mic.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones. They have decent sound isolation, and the cups cover my ears completely (which is a feature I wanted). The microphone is decent. Upon ordering, I didn't know that USB audio is different from what you get via AUX. The USB audio drivers are NOT controlled by your sound card. In regards to this, keep in mind, these headphones are also bass-oriented. I had to get a separate windows equalizer to change my trims, as there seemed to not be enough treble going through the USB audio driver. Other than that, I'm pretty happy with them. Definitely worth my money. No need to spend dozens of dollars on something more unless you really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Flavian Boanca

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with these. Cosmetically they are nice, and the sound quality is good, but they only lasted 10 months! The last 3 of those months were aggravating audio issues, where audio would kick in and out, and not a month after I bought them the cord started to twist. The twisting got so bad I had to use popsicle sticks and zip ties to prevent it from happening. I have bought cheap $5 headphones from the dollar store that lasted significantly longer.
customer_reviews.author: MELODY COUCH

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but I'd personally save up for something better
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker who happens to be a gaming enthusiast recommended this headset to me. For its price, this is an incredible value. However, it's very bulky, slightly gaudy-looking, and the sound leaks out of the headphones quite easily. I wish I had saved up for a nicer headset (when this breaks, I'll look for something that can work on both my gaming console and PC while offering 7.1 surround sound), but this will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Chi V.Top Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Quality & Durability at an affordable price my dudes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these twice over and have long lived well over two years each headset, the second still being in current use Sound canceling, adjustable to even the largest Edd big heads, the mic is well protected inside the headset when not in use, and delivers quality clear sound. Also love the fact that the cable to the headset doesnt want to tangle and is woven cloth for maximum "fancy". The usb plug is probably the sturdiest i'd seen in most headphones of this price range but isnt entirely immune of complications should it get pulled to hard and too often (huehuehue)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset...Must give apps permission to use mic!
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughter. She says they are really good. She's 11 and a big gamer. They have a nice splash of chrome on them. They were a pain in the butt to set up until we figured out that when you add a new headset you have to go into the windows 10 settings and give permission to programs to access the mic of the headset. Once we flipped that switch we were good to go 3 hours later. 🙄 Other than that, they are really good!
customer_reviews.author: TheShark

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset ive ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Wired Headset's it just makes sense, if its wireless it usually doesn't work with more then 1 device, this item works for any PC laptop so far i use it on and sounds fantastic, i hope to see an Xbox/PS? USB and PC Version one day! i will be looking for a version from SADES of this one but with the audio port's instead of USB so i can use it with XBOX tysvm SADES headset's are the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Rkaida

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable headset I have owned, but this headset does what it is supposed to. Great sound quality headphone speakers. Just wish they were a bit more comfortable. Would of also been nice if it a different light color option over the ear speakers, so I could match the color to my pc fan lights, and mouse light which comes with light adjustments to change the colors. Other than what I listed these are very good headphones. Went ahead, and gave it 5 stars because the sound quality is what matters the most imo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can pay a lot more and get a lot less...
customer_reviews.text: This actually works better than I was expecting - I had to turn down the gain on the microphone so it would work properly with Window 10 speech recognition. That was the primary reason I got these, and they excel at understanding my voice. Audio quality is impressive - as some others have said, they needed to turn down their volume settings to compensate. Sound quality is quite sufficient for my needs - the occasional movie and youtube video. I'm not looking for audiophile quality, but this had good depth of sound. Add in the microphone that folds up into the left shell, and these go nicely into my travel bag with a laptop. Well worth the money, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big budget sound for Happy meal price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my G9000s control box kept getting caught on my desk. These have a slightly longer cord length between the headset and and the control box, so they don't get caught (plus #1) The headset weighs less than the G9000 as well. (plus#2) They're white, and actually have white LEDs in them AND the control module also has LEDs (plus #3) They sound great! (plus #4) They're cheap, but don't feel cheap at all (plus #5) Oh and added bonus: the mic boom collapses into the shell of the earpiece.. ✓ smart move! buy these !grumpy gamer approved!
customer_reviews.author: STARSHAK3R

customer_reviews.title: Idk why there are any bad ratings?
customer_reviews.text: Bought strictly for gaming. I've had these headphones since 2016. Absolutely no issues. I've tried other headphones and people I'm with in voice chat think I sound like trash, but when i have THESE headphones on they say it's the best quality. Never ONCE have run into an issue. Makes me wonder why other people have complained so much? As a 32 year old gamer I have a LOT of experience and knowledge with these things. This is the best "bang for your buck" you can get. I hardly ever leave reviews, but I had to make it known that the negative comments are probably on the user end. Not the product.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: It's like a really bright nightlight that you can't turn off
customer_reviews.text: The backlights are way too bright. Ugh. It's like a really bright nightlight that you can't turn off. The ear cups don't pivot to your head. However, the headset kind of formed to my head after a while. Haven't had any quality issues yet. Recommend this product for gamers in need of a cheap headset. EDIT 2019-04-05: 2.5 years later, and I finally had to replace this headset. Not because it failed, but because the earcups and headband were peeling and gross from being on my head for so many hours. I bought another pair of these. Excellent value. Upgraded rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheap and don't seem to fit just right. Functions very well though.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work pretty well, actually. There's a few annoying things about them, though. First, they feel very cheap. Second, they can't seem to fit quite right. And third, they have these obnoxious useless LEDs in them. The LEDs aren't a big deal, but it's still pointless to have. But these things just don't ever seem to fit quite right on my head. I would say I have a somewhat average head size, but they feel like they need a larger head to fit right. Functionally, though, these are a great pair of headphones. They don't exactly compare to my main headphones for music, but that's to be expected since my music headphones are fairly high quality and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best $25 headset you can get.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this headset in January of 2018. It is now September of 2020. The headset has zero issues. Simple plug and play. Can’t change the white light that the logo highlights in, but that’s so minor. I’ve been in Fortnite and COD lobbies and had people ask me what headset I had because it was so clear. Hearing surroundings/pinpointing enemies is no issue. You can’t go wrong at $25 for these.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Overall a OK pair of headphones not my first or last choice
customer_reviews.text: The earcups didn’t make full contact around my ear, and due to my big ears the inside mesh would rub against my ears. The mic is not adjustable and is very far away from your mouth leading you to sound quiet. Was uncomfortable at times. Other than that the headphones were nice for the $25 I had payed for them. I would STRONGLY recommend you putting another $15+ into your headphone budget if you are considering headphones like these. These are probably the best headphones currently out there for the price. Easy installation (plug and play) and they look pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: ButttererFingers

customer_reviews.title: Uh, no...
customer_reviews.text: I liked how well it cancelled out noise, and the microphone sound quality was decent. I didn't like that silly light that is always on when it's plugged in... or the fact that the buttons that mute me don't have any visible change when pressed, so it was hard to know sometimes I was muted... They're also relatively heavy, and can hurt after wearing awhile. They also shorted out the USB port on my computer, so that's a HUGE no... then, after a year, they simply stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: ... in November of last year and had been very happy with them up until now
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones in November of last year and had been very happy with them up until now. Suddenly the mic stopped working the other day despite light use and careful storage :/ Other than them suddenly breaking; audio is fine, they're very comfortable, and the noise cancelling really works. Other comments: Despite having volume on low, audio coming out of the head phones was sometimes audible to those in voice chat. You can't turn the light in the headphone off. It stays on so long as its plugged in and its REALLY bright.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, terrible mic.
customer_reviews.text: The headset is big, comfortable, and sounds pretty good but the main problem is the mic. It sticks out to the side away from your mouth. I planned to use this bad boy for gaming, the problem is no one can hear me. I have to yell into the mic to get a low voice output. I even tried to increase the volume sensitivity to max, resulting in a slightly louder voice that no one can understand. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: mic unusable but comfortable and sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and comfortable headset with decent sound but I have to almost yell to get the mic to pic up voice. I have been through everything that I can thing of PC wise to remedy this but had no luck. When I try my stand alone mic it picks up my voice with no issues at normal levels. I would have given this product a solid 4 to 5 stars but with but with the mic being a main component and not usable I can only give this product 2 out of 5 stars unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: mikieala

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price but has its flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Decent sound quality, comfortable enough for long sessions. Cons: Mic quality/sensitivity isn't great, material feels cheap, lights on either side cannot be turned off. Had them for about 3 months at time of review. Used them nearly every day. Materials feel cheap but I've had no breaking etc. just needs cleaning sometimes. Overall a decent product for the price, loses a star because of the constant lights you cannot turn off (unless unplugged). I use them more as headphones than as a headset, opting for a stand-alone mic. They work, but I wouldn't buy another pair if I were looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: great little volume and mic control switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a different style of SADES where the cord broke after my dog tripped over it. These are comfy, reliable sound, great little volume and mic control switch, and the THICK braided cord is great. I do have problems with the cord slipping out of its holder and getting all entangled in itself, but it doesn't affect the actual useability of this headset. I've been enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Mead

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a whole lot from these headphones, but I was more than pleasantly surprised. Pros +They do not hurt my head (I have a big head so headphones often don't fit) +The sound is great at this price point +The lights on the side look cool +They are built solidly +They have a braided USB cable (that didn't break when I ran over it with my computer chair) Cons (I have to try hard to think of any) +The only think that would make them better is if they came with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Keyboard Master

customer_reviews.title: Great, big headset for price
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great for the price. I've since upgraded to a different one, but these were great for the time being. The sound quality is very nice and the folding microphone is a great feature. Works with the PS4 and with computers really easy - just plug and play. I haven't tested with the Xbox One because I've been using my newer headset. The only complaints I have are that my friend said I seemed quiet through the mic (easily fixed with turning up the mic volume, but I had to turn it way up) and that they're really big, bulky, and heavy. You get used to it, but this headset is big.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, not the worst, but pretty damn good for the price. On occasion there's some static and feint crackling if you dont have anything playing and occasionally some of the folks I game with tell me that my mic is a bit low despite raising the settings - but then these same people tell me everything is fine another day. If you're not a hardcore gamer, these are a good buy. If you're logging serious hours day in and day out, you probably want something a bit more substantial - after a while these also feel a bit heavy on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: It is still in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016 and use it several times a week, sometimes for hours at a time. It is still in like new condition. I have never had any problems with this headset. The sound quality is as to be expected, but it is extremely comfortable. There are little to no cracks in the ear cushions and they are large enough to rest comfortably over the entire ear. I would buy these again at double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mickael

customer_reviews.title: Yeaaah.. they still work but are not head friendly for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about 7 months Picked it up because they were cheap with positive reviews and wanted something to listen with at work. At first, yeah, sorta noise canceling and comfortable but that only lasts maybe 1-2 hrs into wearing them. These are definitely for teenagers or adults with small heads. They do look cool but that is it. If you are a hardcore gamer and plan on 8hrs if gaming then i'd suggest saving your pennies for a decent head set in the 60$+ range. Not sure if this is a "get what you pay for" but if it is then GG and recommend keeping your options open for a different set in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working; 1 year later
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headset, been using for more than 1 year at this point. Would recommend! Edit: After over a year of use, the headset is starting to malfunction. The LED lights are not working (thank god) but the right side of the headset does not work unless I tilt the cord a certain way, leaving a quiet sound only in the left side. Going to pick up a new headset for Christmas more than likely. For $25 this headset did well, but with no customer support and little customization, I'd recommend you go with a different brand and better quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Sound is pretty good for the under-$30 price tag - don't expect ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressive for the price. Sound is pretty good for the under-$30 price tag - don't expect great sound, but it sounds better than a lot of similarly priced headphones. It's on the heavier side, but still pretty comfortable. It's quite well padded. The ear pieces fit completely over my ears. It doesn't slip too much. It seems to be pretty sturdy, and the cord itself is surprisingly tough. I like that it's USB. I am happy with this purchase. We will see how it goes long-term.
customer_reviews.author: marilove

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a day, and for some reason the headset took a crap. It won't get recognised by windows for the USB port. Having an error, and its not on the computer side of it. I'm not sure why this would happen. All USB ports work with everything except the headset. It lights up, but won't work. I've tried everything possible on PC side, but still nothing
customer_reviews.author: Reginald A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, good quality headset with great sound. My only problem is that I wear glasses, and it's been very difficult to adjust the headphones to where they aren't pressing too hard on the frames. I have never had that problem with other headsets. Overall, though, this is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on Mac
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on my iMac. Just a heads up to fellow Mac users. When I first plugged it in, the stereo channels were swapped (Left was right, and right was left.) You can fix it easily with your built-in Audio Midi Setup app (in Utilities.) Just select USB Audio Device, Click Configure Speakers, then just change Left to Right and vice versa. Super easy and works like a pro. These are super comfortable and the mic sounds great on the other end. I am super pleased with my purchase. You're harder pressed to find a better value for your dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Dad in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low cost gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional low cost headset. The design is very nice. The retractable mic is great and is my main reason for purchasing this headset. Now my cat can no longer chew on the mic. The sound quality is crisp and clear. The mic quality is also very clear. The wire for the headset is also much more durable than the plastic wiring you normally get.
customer_reviews.author: Soynuts

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat if for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I found this set very comfortable to use. The sound quality is as good as headphones 3 times the price! Although they don't eliminate outside noise they reduce it as they should. They are very well designed so I'm expecting them to hold up. They don't feel cheap or flimsy. Overall, for the price, you're not going to beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love this head set! For the price you cant beat. Im giving this a 4/5 the only reason is straight out of the box the head phones are just plain loud. And what I mean is you WILL need some 3rd party program to calibrate these bad boys to sound perfect. I use razor sound pro ( which there is a free version that will help) with the program and these head phones it really sounds nice and the quality is of a 150 dollar head set. Unfortunately I cant say anything about the mic since I own a studio style set up so I have no reason to test this. Huge thumbs up, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Skurnicki

customer_reviews.title: This is a very reliable headset
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the most reliable and toughest headset I've ever owned, the last couple of headsets were junk and couldn't hold up to abuse and man handling, the little white piece that goes around your ear likes to peel off by age and the annoying thing I would give it is the power cord it holds a lot of tension within the wire and it twist and turns, The sound quality is amazing, crystal clear after all the abuse it's been through. also the microphone is okay and it still needs work, it very quiet and it's hard to hear sometimes I would just recommend this headset just for listening lol
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fraim

customer_reviews.title: Not just for gamers.
customer_reviews.text: I don't play any games but I do need a reliable, solidly built, headset to use for my internet teaching. We are still using outdated flash and have not moved to html 5, yet so my other expensive and more delicate bluetooth headsets do not play well. My wife says I look like an astronaut :-) but who cares, this thing could survive Armageddon and works seamlessly with legacy tech. What's more, you could probably hang from the braided cord, it's that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mazatlan Gringo Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, look at all the 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because it was cheap and white, just like my friend Real talk though Pros: - Sounds very good for price range (bought for $25.99 better or as good as $60+ headsets) - Comfortable after long use (although I haven't found an uncomfortable headset yet) - Sound Isolation is really really good - Aesthetically pleasing (with braided cables) Cons - The mic kinda sucks - Mic boom and volume control is a little fragile - Sound isolation is too good you'll get yelled at a second time I'd recommend them if you need to fit your theme in a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the sound quality of the headphones, the integrated microphone, and the in-line controls. The only downside has been the fabric covering the headphones which, despite gentle use, is peeling off the underlying foam.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Brummett

customer_reviews.title: look awsome, sound good, not made to last. the DAC in the inline control shorted very quickly
customer_reviews.text: they sound great but the DAC thats on the inline remote is a POS. after about 3 months it shorted out. after waiting a couple weeks to hear back from SADES RMA department and thinking about how much it would cost to send these to china to get RMAd i just cut the cord b4 the inline controle and rewired the speakers and mic with 3.5mm jacks and got em working agian. no white led logo but sound just as good as b4 and the mic actually sounds better im told.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Giving three stars because the mic doesn't work very well. For some reason mine doesn't want to pick up my voice unless I'm shouting into the thing. It's disappointing because I got it at a great peice, build quality is good and sound quality is decent for what I paid. EDIT: After forgetting I left this little gem a poor-ish review, I was going through my profile and saw it. So, after having this headset for a good while and figuring out what I was doing wrong. Wow.... Just wow.. I returned $150 steel series headset because these were so good and comfortable. Need it say more? Buy them. You won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Cinizstar

customer_reviews.title: The muffs go all the way around my ears and the microphone isolation is great. Seriously for the money it's just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow, you really can't go wrong for the quality and comfort of this headset. The muffs go all the way around my ears and the microphone isolation is great. Seriously for the money it's just awesome. Plus, they look pretty badass. The cables feel reinforced. At first I got upset because I thought I ordered a headset without the microphone but it turned out the microphone slides up into the headset, so you can conceal it if you want. Pretty damn cool! Logos glow in the dark looks great. I use it for gaming, conference calls, whatever!
customer_reviews.author: David G. Aimi

customer_reviews.title: If you are a budget person like me spending to get these is your best bet
customer_reviews.text: These headphone for the price are on word "AMAZING"! I have purchased so many different headphone from 3.5 jack to multi plug-in and even Blu-tooth. I have to say hands down these headphone give quality sound, so much so I do not even use my speakers anymore. Inside the game the immersion of sound can freak you out coming around the corner (Resident Evil 7). If you are a budget person like me spending to get these is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: John Barr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound, But Microphone Doesn't work after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable and the sound is amazing. The microphone is very good and picked up my voice over the noise in the back ground. The only problem I have is the microphone went out on it after 6 months. Know that I am the only one that uses it and I am not a rough person. I have tried settings on the computer to resolve the situation and it isn't working. I have not contacted the company, I believe that I have owned it for too long. I will post further information after contacting the company.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. My one one gripe with these is when I turn the computer off, the light on the side of the headphones stay lit. I don't expect these to last forever, but the seem real good so far and I've had them forever, but I've had them since July 2019 and they're still holding up. 10/20/2019. Would buy on a budget
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Work very well on my Switch, haven't tried using them directly on my tv yet but used them on my laptop for Discord chat and the sound is very good. I have a slight problem with my gauge earrings not letting me put the headphones completely over my ear because the plugs stick out too much but other than that it's working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Va1is

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: I work online and use these daily. They are comfortable and sound good. I like the full around the ear headset because it helps me block out other noises and distractions. This works fine on my Mac. A few critiques, I don't like the inline audio controller, so I control mute and volume on my computer. I wish the mic was flexible like my previous headset, but I keep this one stored away in the headset and my volume seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: 9a7ner

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work well. I got them for my fiance and he enjoys using them to play PUBG and online cooperative games. They fit him well and allow him to hear what's going on in the game well and communicate clearly with his teammates.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Clinkscales

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years and still working
customer_reviews.text: Been using mine for a while now, they're not great the mic input is really low on discord, but they still work. The quality is great for so cheap, I've been rough with them dropping them a lot, tripping on the cord. Still work the same as the day I got them. I'll probably end up breaking my laptop first.
customer_reviews.author: 2Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, cheap headset.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, cheap headset. I have been using these for a couple of months now, and I have to say I am quite surprised with the build quality for such a cheap price. They're made out of durable plastic and foam. The foam hasn't even begun to start peeling. As for the sound quality, it's absolutely superb. In games, I can hear everything crystal clear. The bass is also unexpectedly great. The mic itself is hidden in the left side of the headphone, and when pulled down, has a decent sound quality when using it in Discord and Skype.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: For this price? yup this is the best headset that you can get.
customer_reviews.text: I used for half a year, then my brother in law need another headset so I gave him these, he fell in love with these headphone, then Another friend need one part.... long story short, I've already purchased 5 of these just the give them away to my friend who has crappy headset with crapy mic, this is absolutely perfect, NOTE.I'm talking the price per quality is incredible balanced. 10/10 if I need another pair I will not look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E.

customer_reviews.title: They look good and feel good but the people i play with ...
customer_reviews.text: They look good and feel good but the people i play with complain of constant loud feedback. I've checked drivers, OS settings, and software settings but nothing helps. Now they sit at my desk with no use.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The sound on these are amazing, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these are amazing, especially for the price. It's also a nice night light because the sides do light up. The bass is just outstanding too. The headset is comfortable to wear thanks to the padding on the top as well as for your ears. The mic is a little touchy when you are using it for VoIP. But it is a great plug and play Headset and perfect for gaming which is what I use it for, no software required to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Short n Sweet
customer_reviews.text: The ear pads are super comfortable. The padding on the headband feels like memory foam which is a very nice touch. Sound quality is excellent. It's great for first person shooters when I need to be more aware of audio ques. The volume controls and mute buttons for both the mic and headphones is very convenient (although I have keyboard audio controls as well). The hide-a-way mic is fantastic, and has surprisingly good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Drivers are an issue in windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design and weight, it fit comfortably. The drivers were horrible to deal with though and ultimately ruined this headset. According to several forums, including Tom's Hardware (defacto) this is a common problem for Sades products. Current drivers from Sades.cc site do not recognize device, default windows 10 drivers do not enable mic, making this useless as a communications device. Ended up returning after 5 hours of use. In this day and age, I'm not going to spend time fighting a driver issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: this headphones work great. I have brought 3 headphones already and given my grandson one . He is a gamer , good clear sound .Sade's USB Gaming. doesn't hurt my ears. won't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer montini

customer_reviews.title: Simply astonishing - Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Love that it plugs into the USB. I was honestly a little hesitant, because I had already previously purchased a gaming headset that was crap after a few uses, but this one absolutely blew my mind. Not only does it look, really good, it feels good and the sound is superb. I can easily wear for hours at a time whether I'm on Youtube, or gaming. Also lights up on the sides when plugged in. People have no trouble hearing me.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, poor volume control design
customer_reviews.text: The volume dial about three feet down the cord is very bulky and heavy, it gets caught on my chair constantly. Other than that, the sound quality is great for a pair under 30 bucks. The mic is a plastic piece that still works when its in the upright position so if you want to mute it you must mute the mic rather than sliding it back into the headset. The lights on the volume control and headphones are always on, even when the PC is off and I don't believe this is an option with the update. Serves as a nightlight I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mattric

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I've ever owned! Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best headset I've ever owned, the last headset I bought was about 6 years ago and paid over 100$ for them. They were name brand and brand new at the time, these blow them away in quality, fitment and comfort. I cannot believe that these are under $30, with all the cheap stuff I've received on Amazon recently I can say these restored my faith in good deals from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: these arent bad. on my next go around i plan on ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price...these arent bad. on my next go around i plan on spending a bit more and getting something more comfortable and that sound better. the mic works well...almost too well for games though. it picks up any little sound. i dont know if its the compressed sound or the way the speakers are positioned...but my ears do hurt after a fairly short period of use. its definitely not volume...im paranoid enough to be the guy wearing ear plugs when im close enough to a stage at a concert.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: This is my honest opinion I gave this pair of headphones five stars, Extremely well built, very durable For the price they are amazing The sound is limited to what your computer setting are but the quality of sound is very clear and clean. The chord is braided and a good length with a rubber chord retainer. Good padding on the ear pieces and the cross band for the head. Volume adjuster and mic on off switch work good Mic is very consealable as it folds into the headset itself, Over all for the price of these headphones you can't beat them, very clean look not to bulky and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua/katie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,Affordable,Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice touch with the lights, usb so you just plug and it's set. Extremely comfortable, can't stress this enough, mic is placed on the left side and can be pulled down or up without it sticking out. There's a mute button for your mic but also for the sound, interesting, has been very helpful. Would definitely recommend it to others, especially if it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the volume knob isn't ideal
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding headphones! The lighted accents are cool to look at and it works with both of my computers and my android phone. I would recommend these for extended gaming sessions; the headset doesn't put a lot of force onto the head. My only complaint is that the volume control is a farther away than I'd like (when sitting, it rests at my waist) and the lights from it are kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Swrrn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but my microphone stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this headset. It's comfortable, and the sound is good, but the third time I used it the microphone got REALLY quiet. It might be okay if the arm of the microphone was adjustable, but it's not. It's kind of useless without the mic, so I guess I need to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorien

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget headset that lasted for 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had the headset for 2.5 years. Everything was great. At the 1.5 year mark, the material covering the foam on the headset started coming off. Sound and noise cancellation has been great for the whole time and the mic just died after having it for 2.5 years. ( the same day that I am writing this review because I am looking for a new headset now.) I don't know the story with the other people that have bought the headsets that had theirs destroyed quickly which could have been a either parties fault.
customer_reviews.author: B1938

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones For Gamers And Music
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is one of the best headsets I have gotten. I can leave these on for ever and it won't hurt. Totally recommend\(._. )/ Speakers: Amazing! super comfortable and it fits ears well. Blocks outside sounds/great noise canceling (Great for gaming) No crackles or pops in the Speakers #veryclearsound Mic: Easy to hear through.Very high quality. No buffs or malfunctions. If you don't want it in the way you can flip it back in to make space. LED: Super nice and premium Wire: study and clean. External Audio Control: Easy and simple. Great to use for changing settings quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, nice sound and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice product for the price. This headset functions just as well any of the name brands, with a little improvement on the lighting and buttons it would be perfect. Note that the mute buttons for the mic and sound does not give off any indication when pressed, making it hard to tell if the user is muted or not, and the headset light (can be quite bright at night) cannot be turned of. Update: the controller malfunctioned after a couple months, the increase volume button now reduces the volume so I have 2 buttons that reduces the volume. Minor issue for me since I adjust my volume on my keyboard, but may be concerning for others.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Not a working mic for PC, AVOID BUYING FOR PC THIS IS NOT THE SAME PRODUCT IT WAS A FEW YEARS BACK
customer_reviews.text: Avoid buying if planning to use the mic functions, bought this headset way back and loved the comfort and quality of it but despite appearing to be the same product, this one is made for controllers and doesn't even include a usb so the mic portion is virtually useless for PC users.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Bye Turtle Beach!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing headset, I bough myself and my girlfriend a set, we play WOW together. For roughly $30 you are getting a really wonderful set. Crisp sound, good base and a clean sounding mic. They could charge $100 and it would still be worth it. I stopped buying turtle beach sets after finding these.
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking durable USB headset
customer_reviews.text: Good headset for the price. main reasons I chose this one are the color matches my PC and the mic isn't one of those frail bendy wire types those kind never last long but this one has a more rigid mic that folds into the headset. It has a good sound and the cushion doesn't make my ear lobes sore. the light is bright and the set feels durable. the cord is pretty long and it's braided. btw don't use headphones too long or too loud they can damage your ear drums.
customer_reviews.author: Derek. E

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The headset has great sound quality at an entry level price point. They fit comfortably and are noise cancelling. The bass is deep and has a good sound. I did not expect a headset at this price to sound this nice. I would recommend these to any budget gamer as a safe alternative to headsets 2 or 3 times this price. UPDATE: 1 1/2 years later... still love these and use them daily. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like these. I did return because there was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these. I did return because there was a usb connection malfunction and they didn't work, but they are huge! I felt like a space cadet when I had them on. That alone I do not like and would not have wanted to use them, but as far as how they work, I cannot say because mine didn't. To each his own, as some people have said they love them. Personal preference. If size matters to you as far as headsets, take into consideration that these are substantially larger than the average headset.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is omnidirectional
customer_reviews.text: This headset looks and feels nice. It's comfortable to wear and functions well. Competitively priced and overall good quality. No issues with drivers on WIn7, truly was plug-n-play. Audio is clean and clear. By design there is a natural outside-noise reduction in the headphones that can lead to pretty immersive listening experience. Caveats: The microphone is omnidirectional. This has -no- noise cancellation. If you are planning on group gaming, expect that your friends will hear every little thing that happens around you. This fact shows up on the box, but at the time of this writing is not posted on the product listing. Attached picture is the text directly from the back of the box.
customer_reviews.author: KC M.

customer_reviews.title: Mic sucks, mic boom is hard plastic so it cant ...
customer_reviews.text: Mic boom is hard plastic so it cant be moved closer to your mouth. Not very good quality all around. Light on the headset bugs me, you cant turn it off that i have seen. Cord is super thin. Has lasted 6 months now so that's something
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best audio quality after using a Razer Electra V1 for 4+ years, as the headset doesn't sit flush against your ears, nor can you adjust the rotation so a lot of sound escapes through the back. Other than that, it's feels really sturdy, comfortable, the woven cable is quite nice and heavy so it doesn't get in the way by twisting and like normal cords. Overall, it's fair quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rei

customer_reviews.title: Durability is bad | 2018 | Gaming | Music
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy USB headsets again. After using this for around two years It has broken and screwed up my audio on my computer. The USB on it broke the USB in my computer and when I pulled it out lightly the computer USB broke. It doesn't work and when it did work I always had to make sure the wire to the headset to the computer was straight due to its extreme length the USB part would have to be straight up and it would never stand still I always had to put my speaker over the wire to hold it down. The sound is good for gaming but the durability of it is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this headset. I've used it for months now. Before purchasing, I worried about the sound quality and the exterior finish feeling too "cheap". However, upon receiving it, I found its matte finish to be very charming. Externally, it feels far better than the usual headset at its price level. Very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. Of course, the sound and mic quality are also more than enough for general work and gaming needs. Highly recommend this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Von Briage

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good headphones. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good headphones. Comfortable, aesthetically pleasing with the only con being I couldn't get the software to install correctly to set up surround sound. However, downloading Razer software and installing the free version of the Razer Surround software has given me options as far as surround, bass boost, voice clarity and an EQ. Would highly recommend these if you're looking for a great gaming headset that is comfy and great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb0985

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for the price. I’ve never had any issues, and I have put a lot of hours into this headset. I actually came to review this after owning the headset for years because I just got done gaming and thought, wow these were inexpensive and have worked far better than any turtle beaches etc. that I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: William Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for music, skype, games, language learning.
customer_reviews.text: This headset comfortably covers the whole ear. The sound and mic quality are excellent. The design is very attractive (the wolf logo on the sides illuminates when plugged-in). The cable is long enough, and is doesn't tend to tangle (which is great). It comes with a control for volume and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son- he loves them and tells me they have great sound. Apparently, they are of high enough quality so that he can’t hear a word I say....
customer_reviews.author: JR831

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for durability
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these over a year and the paint is chipping. I end up with white paint in my hair after each use. In the beginning I was happy with the headphones and the quality, but it sounds far away now and the paint/fake leather chipping away has been disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and Great headset
customer_reviews.text: First off I'd like to say, I ordered these and received them not working. I quickly notified Robledo and they fixed the order and replaced them with no hassle or worry. Customer service like this goes a long way! The headphones themselves I would rate a 4 star, but I give them a 5 based on customer service for Robledo. I can't be more thankful, for the money they are totally worth it, and they are very comfortable and work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ... as a replacement for what i thought was a good head set
customer_reviews.text: bought as a replacement for what i thought was a good head set, and was initially planning to use as a back up set, threw that idea out the window though and am now happily using them as my primary head set. The sound is good, for the price i would almost say great, and i have been told by others that I talk with that the quality from the mike is satisfactory. Over all i am quite happy with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Train_22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a headphone destroyer!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was curious if the usb plug would work with my finicky computer, but was very happy that it did. The sound is super clear, the ear pieces are super comfortable, and even my dad is jealous about my glowing headset! I love love LOVE the protection they put on the wire, thats my worst weakness when it comes to headphones, so I feel less afraid of it just snapping or flaking away.
customer_reviews.author: Aziza C.

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. I would recommend this to anyone with a budget and looking for a sleek headset. Pros - Very comfy - Fits head well - Good quality - True to picture - Lights work great - Sound quality is amazing Cons - Mic works just fine but is not as good as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. The item came the same as detailed in the description. The seller very responsible with the delivery. I have no complaints. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JULIO ISAAC RUIZ MEJIAS

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, terrible mic
customer_reviews.text: The mic is just terrible. With a lot of tweaking, you can get it loud enough for people to hear you, but you'll sound terrible. If all you care about is hearing, not speaking, go ahead, if you actually want to use this for talking in game or Skype, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality isn't amazing but not bad. The sound is decent. The ear ups are a hair on the shallow side but again decent. For the price the mic is really sensitive and will pick up a lot. They don't block much noise but with music or loud in game sounds it's not a big deal. Side notes that don't really matter, the inline controls are not top quality but work well enough. Also the white lights are quite bright in a dark room. Overall good for the price, good quick and dirty finish to a mid tier gaming setup
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Reliable headset
customer_reviews.text: I just starting gaming on my PC again and let me tell you these are great. The cord is nice and as long so don't have to worry about that. I worried that a USB headset just wasn't going to cut it and a 25 dollar one on top of that. But actually I got these pretty fast. Little to no set up and they sound wonderful. I can hear everything and it's great. You can turn the volume up and down on your computer and the controls on the cord, you can mute your mic (very helpful) and they store easily. Completely recommend these to any not looking to spend $100 bucks on a headset.
customer_reviews.author: marcussburkholder

customer_reviews.title: the mute button and volume buttons dont work flawlessly so i quit useing them and muted the mic manually which can be annoying. i used them for about 6 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: these are very bulky, and have a solid sound quality. the mute button and volume buttons dont work flawlessly so i quit useing them and muted the mic manually which can be annoying. i used them for about 6 months and bought another headset because them being so bulky and me having a tiny head it caused me to get headaches after about 45 mins of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Not only that it actually looks good with retractable mic
customer_reviews.text: I never had high end headset nor am I sensitive to quality differences. As long as I can hear well, speak into it well and it does not get too hot after extended use, I am sold. So far, it fulfills all my requirements. Not only that it actually looks good with retractable mic. I am giving this 4 stars only because I believe it pulls out my hair sometimes but that isn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Park

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really expect anything great when I bought them but they surprised me on ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really expect anything great when I bought them but they surprised me on how well they preformed. Sound pretty good nothing to really complain about, has some sound leak my friend say they can hear my music when we are playing but it’s whatever. The lighting up feature is kinda cheesy but you can’t see it while paying soo it’s whatever, over all headsets is pretty decent for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ito

customer_reviews.title: Noise-canceling works on only one ear
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work okay, the noise quality is decent. Plug-n-play on my windows 10 machine. The hideaway mic is decent and the fabric cord's decent It's awkward to get on my head but once it's on it's comfortable. My biggest complaint is that it seems that the noise-canceling works only on my right rear. The left one with the mic doesn't work at all. It's awkward and unbalanced but I wasn't necessarily in it for the noise canceling features anyways. I'll get over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones, but awful microphone.
customer_reviews.text: I read/watched a lot of positive reviews on this headset, and at $25/free shipping I decided to take a chance. The sound quality is great, they are comfortable to wear and the materials feel sturdy. I really like the long braided cable, it feels like it will last. However, the microphone quality is absolute garbage. Very quiet, low input signal compared to other USB headset mics I've used. If you just want some fairly nice budget headphones, these are a good buy. If you need a usable microphone, these suck. This being the case, I guess I am glad that the mic seamlessly folds up into the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W Schmidt

product_meta.title: Xbox One Gaming Headset,SADES Stereo PC PS4 Gaming Headset with Microphone Noise Cancelling Over Ear Gaming Headphones with Soft Memory Earmuffs for Xbox one / PS4/ Laptop/Mac
feature_bullets: 【SUPER COMPATIBILITY】- The gaming headset compatible with new Xbox One, Nintendo switch, PS4, PC, Tablet, iPad, computer and mobile phone. When connect with old version Xbox One, please note you need an extra adapter (not included).

【SUPER COMPATIBILITY】- The gaming headset compatible with new Xbox One, Nintendo switch, PS4, PC, Tablet, iPad, computer and mobile phone. When connect with old version Xbox One, please note you need an extra adapter (not included).

【NOISE REDUCTION MICROPHONE】- This PS4 gaming headset with professional mute technology, so that it can effectively reduce the ambient noise, pick up a clear, accurate pointing, shooting for online games.

【CLEAR SURROUND STEREO SOUND】- Built-in industry-leading high precision 50mm magnetic neodymium driver pursues a more immersive experience, bringing you vivid sound field, sound clarity, shock feeling sound. Perfect for various games like Metal Gear Solid, Call of Duty, etc.

【WHAT YOU GET】- 1 x Xbox One gaming headset, 1 x splitter cable and 1 x user manual. We hope everyone purchase from SADES can enjoy the fun. We promise gaming headset have 1-year manufacturer's warranty and 30 days hassle-free returns.
